title: Traits and Features
content: e Party Feature Every time Intoxicating Strike hits, the monk gains Life of the Party, which increases Armour Class and Attack Rolls against Drunk targets. This effect can stack. Drunken Master lv 7 Leap to Your Feet Feature When you are Prone, standing up uses only 1.5 m / 5 ft of your Movement speed. Drunken Master lv 6 Cheeky Tipple Feature You are Immune to the negative effects of being Drunk. Once per day, when you drink alcohol, you regain half your Ki Points (rounded down). Drunken Master
